nodes.documentation:
@title The contract responsible for holding RenEx trader funds
@author Republic Protocol
nodes.name: RenExBalances

nodes.documentation: @notice After deployment, setRenExSettlementContract should be called
@notice Throws if called by any account other than the RenExSettlement contract
nodes.name: onlyRenExSettlementContract
setRenExSettlementContract
setRewardVault
incrementBalance
decrementBalanceWithFee
deposit
withdraw
getBalances
